Generic Attack Upgrades.name: Extended Range
Generic Attack Upgrades.effect: Ranged attacks reach 30 spaces instead of 15.

Generic Attack Upgrades.name: Long Range
Generic Attack Upgrades.effect: Ranged attacks reach 100 spaces instead of 15.

Generic Attack Upgrades.name: Perception Range
Generic Attack Upgrades.effect: Direct attacks can target anyone you can see instead of 30 spaces.

Generic Attack Upgrades.name: Enhanced Scale
Generic Attack Upgrades.effect: Double the size of Area attacks (e.g., 6sp radius, 12sp cone, 24sp line).

Generic Attack Upgrades.name: Precise
Generic Attack Upgrades.effect: Choose which targets are affected by Area attacks.

Generic Attack Upgrades.name: Ranged AOE
Generic Attack Upgrades.effect: Area attacks can originate from a designated point within 15 spaces.

Accuracy Bonuses.name: Accurate Attack
Accuracy Bonuses.effect: +Tier to Accuracy rolls, -Tier to Damage and Condition rolls. A basic accuracy/damage trade-off.

Accuracy Bonuses.name: Reliable Accuracy
Accuracy Bonuses.effect: Advantage on Accuracy rolls, but suffer a -4 penalty to all Accuracy rolls. For consistent hitting with a reduced total bonus.
Accuracy Bonuses.usage: Consistent hitting with reduced total bonus

Accuracy Bonuses.name: Critical Accuracy
Accuracy Bonuses.effect: Your critical hit range is expanded to 15-20 on the d20.

Accuracy Bonuses.name: Powerful Critical
Accuracy Bonuses.effect: Add your Tier bonus again to Damage and Condition rolls on critical hits. Enhances the strength of your critical hit effects.
Accuracy Bonuses.usage: Enhances critical hit effect roll strength

Accuracy Bonuses.name: Overhit
Accuracy Bonuses.effect: When your Accuracy roll exceeds the target's Avoidance by 5 or more, add half the difference to your Effect roll. Rewards high accuracy against low-defense targets.
Accuracy Bonuses.usage: Rewards high accuracy against low-defense targets

Accuracy Bonuses.name: Blitz
Accuracy Bonuses.effect: +1 Accuracy for every 6 spaces you moved toward the target this turn. A mobile attacker bonus that stacks with movement.
Accuracy Bonuses.usage: Mobile attacker bonus, stacks with movement

Accuracy Bonuses.name: Ricochet
Accuracy Bonuses.effect: Critical hits trigger an additional attack against a different target within range.
Accuracy Bonuses.restriction: The secondary attack cannot crit from the target being Stunned.
Accuracy Bonuses.exclusion: Cannot trigger from Double-Tap, Explosive Critical, or other Ricochet.

Accuracy Bonuses.name: Double-Tap
Accuracy Bonuses.effect: Critical hits trigger the same attack again against the same target.
Accuracy Bonuses.restriction: The secondary attack cannot crit from the target being Stunned.
Accuracy Bonuses.exclusion: Cannot trigger from Ricochet, Explosive Critical, or other Double-Tap.

Accuracy Bonuses.name: Explosive Critical
Accuracy Bonuses.effect: Critical hits trigger an attack against all enemies within 3 spaces of the target, if the attack would also hit them.
Accuracy Bonuses.restriction: Cannot apply to AOE attacks. Secondary attacks cannot crit from the target being Stunned.
Accuracy Bonuses.exclusion: Cannot trigger from Double-Tap, Ricochet, or other Explosive Critical.

Core Damage Modifiers.name: Power Attack
Core Damage Modifiers.effect: +Tier to Damage rolls, -Tier to Accuracy rolls. A basic damage/accuracy trade-off.

Core Damage Modifiers.name: High Impact
Core Damage Modifiers.effect: Replace your 3d6 damage roll with a flat 15 damage. Eliminates damage variance for consistent output.
Core Damage Modifiers.usage: Eliminates damage variance for consistent output

Core Damage Modifiers.name: Enhanced Effect
Core Damage Modifiers.effect: Add one additional damage die to your damage rolls. This increases your damage potential and average.

Dice Manipulation.name: Reliable Effect
Dice Manipulation.effect: Roll an extra damage die, then drop the lowest result.

Dice Manipulation.name: Critical Effect
Dice Manipulation.effect: All effect dice explode on rolls of 5 or 6. Dice continue rolling when showing 5-6, and results are cumulative.
Dice Manipulation.usage: Dice continue rolling when showing 5-6, cumulative

Armor and Defense Bypass.name: Armor Piercing
Armor and Defense Bypass.effect: Suffer a -Tier penalty to your Attack rolls to ignore the target's Durability bonus from their Endurance attribute. For Direct attacks, reduce the Damage roll instead of the Attack roll.
Armor and Defense Bypass.note: For Direct attacks, reduce Damage roll instead of Attack roll

Armor and Defense Bypass.name: Brutal
Armor and Defense Bypass.effect: When your Damage roll exceeds the target's Durability by 10 or more, you deal extra damage equal to half the difference.
Armor and Defense Bypass.bannedCombination: Cannot combine with Heavy Strike or Headshot

Damage Over Time and Area.name: Bleed
Damage Over Time and Area.effect: The target takes the identical damage again at the end of your next 2 turns.

Damage Over Time and Area.name: Splash Damage
Damage Over Time and Area.effect: Adjacent targets take Tier+1d6 damage if your Attack roll would hit their Avoidance. Applies to Melee and Ranged attacks only.
Damage Over Time and Area.usage: Applies to Melee and Ranged attacks only

Damage Over Time and Area.name: Environmental
Damage Over Time and Area.effect: All hexes hit by the attack become hazardous terrain until the start of your next turn. Each rank after the first is an extra turn. Any character entering or ending their turn in an affected space takes the attack's Damage and Condition. Cannot have 'Precise' upgrade.
Damage Over Time and Area.hazardEffect: Deal attack's Damage and Condition to any character entering or ending turn in hex

Utility Effects.name: Shatter
Utility Effects.effect: Deal double damage to structures and vehicles. A specialized anti-object enhancement.

Utility Effects.name: Leech
Utility Effects.effect: Regain HP equal to half the damage you deal.

Instant Defeat Mechanics.name: Finishing Blow
Instant Defeat Mechanics.effect: If your attack reduces an enemy to 5×rank HP or below, the enemy is defeated instead. Maximum 3 ranks.

Instant Defeat Mechanics.name: Culling Strike
Instant Defeat Mechanics.effect: If your attack reduces an enemy below 1/5 of their maximum HP, the enemy is defeated instead.

Condition Bonuses.name: Critical Condition
Condition Bonuses.effect: Your Condition rolls critically hit on a 15-20 range on the d20.

Condition Bonuses.name: Lasting Condition
Condition Bonuses.effect: If your Condition roll exceeds the target's Resistance by 10 or more, the condition's duration extends by 1 turn.

Condition Bonuses.name: Mass Effect
Condition Bonuses.effect: A single Direct condition attack can target up to your Tier in enemies simultaneously. Suffers a -Tier penalty to Condition rolls.

Condition Bonuses.name: Collateral Condition
Condition Bonuses.effect: A successful condition triggers the attack against all targets within a 3-space burst.
Condition Bonuses.restriction: Cannot apply to AOE attacks, and triggers only once per attack.

Condition Bonuses.name: Contagious
Condition Bonuses.effect: A successful condition triggers the attack against the nearest enemy. Can chain up to Tier/2 times (rounded down) per attack.

Condition Bonuses.name: Cursed
Condition Bonuses.effect: If 2 × (Condition roll - Resistance) is greater than or equal to the target's remaining HP, the condition becomes permanent.

Condition Bonuses.name: Overwhelming Affliction
Condition Bonuses.effect: If your Condition roll exceeds the target's Resistance by 3 × Tier, the condition becomes permanent regardless of the target's HP.

Melee Specialization.name: Heavy Strike
Melee Specialization.effect: Expend all Movement and one Quick Action to charge, adding +3×Tier to Damage and Condition rolls, but -Tier to Accuracy rolls.

Melee Specialization.name: Quick Strikes
Melee Specialization.effect: Expend all Movement and one Quick Action to charge, allowing you to make the same Melee attack three times against a single target, but with a -Tier penalty to Accuracy rolls.

Melee Specialization.name: Whirlwind Strike
Melee Specialization.effect: A single Melee attack targets up to your Tier in enemies simultaneously, but with a -Tier penalty to Accuracy rolls.

Ranged Specialization.name: Headshot
Ranged Specialization.effect: Expend all Movement and one Quick Action to charge, adding +3×Tier to Damage and Condition rolls, but -Tier to Accuracy rolls.

Ranged Specialization.name: Barrage
Ranged Specialization.effect: Expend all Movement and one Quick Action to charge, allowing you to make the same Ranged attack three times against a single target, but with a -Tier penalty to Accuracy rolls.

Ranged Specialization.name: Scatter Shot
Ranged Specialization.effect: A single Ranged attack targets up to your Tier in enemies simultaneously, but with a -Tier penalty to Accuracy rolls.

Universal Combat Techniques.name: Flurry of Blows
Universal Combat Techniques.effect: Make the same attack three times against a single target, with a -Tier penalty to Accuracy, Damage, and Condition rolls. Works with Melee or Ranged attacks.
Universal Combat Techniques.effectModifier: -Tier to Accuracy, Damage, and Condition rolls
Universal Combat Techniques.usage: Works with Melee or Ranged attacks

Universal Combat Techniques.name: Pounce
Universal Combat Techniques.effect: Move up to 6 spaces in a straight line toward the target as part of the attack. This movement occurs during the attack resolution.

Universal Combat Techniques.name: Splinter
Universal Combat Techniques.effect: Defeating an enemy triggers another attack against a new target before your turn ends. Can chain up to Tier/2 additional attacks (rounded up).

Tactical Enhancements.name: Menacing
Tactical Enhancements.effect: Reducing an enemy to 0 HP allows an Intimidation attempt against all enemies within 3 spaces of the target. Enemies with HP less than or equal to your Intimidation bonus will surrender.
Tactical Enhancements.surrenderThreshold: Enemies with HP ≤ Intimidation bonus surrender

Tactical Enhancements.name: Disengage
Tactical Enhancements.effect: A successful hit prevents opportunity attacks from all hit targets until the end of your turn.

Tactical Enhancements.name: Extra Attack
Tactical Enhancements.effect: A successful hit with a successful effect allows an identical attack against the same target. Must succeed on both Accuracy and Effect. Can only occur once per turn.
Tactical Enhancements.usage: Must hit and succeed on both Accuracy and Effect

Sequential Attack Systems.name: Analyzing Strike
Sequential Attack Systems.effect: +1 to a chosen stat (Accuracy/Damage/Conditions) for each previous Analyzing Strike against the same target. The bonus is capped at your Tier and resets if you skip attacking the target for one turn or activate it on another target.
Sequential Attack Systems.resetCondition: Bonus resets if you skip attacking target for one turn
Sequential Attack Systems.limitation: Only one target can have Analyzing Strike bonus at any time

Sequential Attack Systems.name: Follow-Up Strike
Sequential Attack Systems.effect: A successful hit with a successful effect allows one Base Attack against the same target. Can only occur once per turn.

Sequential Attack Systems.name: Counterattack
Sequential Attack Systems.effect: Using an attack against an enemy that missed you or failed their effect against you adds your Tier to a chosen roll (Accuracy, Damage, or Condition, selected at purchase).
Sequential Attack Systems.bonusSelection: Choose Accuracy, Damage, or Condition when purchasing
Sequential Attack Systems.restriction: Cannot use with limits requiring you to be attacked or affected

Sequential Attack Systems.name: Exploit
Sequential Attack Systems.effect: +Tier to Damage and Condition rolls against targets currently afflicted by any Condition.

Combat Control.name: Priority Target
Combat Control.effect: After hitting a target, mark them as the Priority Target until the start of your next turn. Other characters gain a Tier/2 Accuracy bonus (rounded up) against this target. Can only be used once per turn.
Combat Control.allyBonus: Other characters gain Tier/2 Accuracy bonus against marked target (rounded up)

Combat Control.name: Bully
Combat Control.effect: Damaging a target with a Power score equal to or less than yours allows you to force a 1-space movement.

Combat Control.name: Martial Artist
Combat Control.effect: Critical hits allow you to choose to apply Grab, a 3-space forced movement, or the Prone condition.

Combat Control.name: Grappler
Combat Control.effect: Deal +Tier damage against targets you have Grabbed.
Combat Control.requirement: Must have Grab condition active on target

Enemy Type Bonuses.name: Minion Slayer
Enemy Type Bonuses.effect: Choose Accuracy, Damage, or Condition when purchasing. Bonus applies against enemies with 10 maximum HP.

Enemy Type Bonuses.name: Captain Slayer
Enemy Type Bonuses.effect: Choose Accuracy, Damage, or Condition when purchasing. Bonus applies against enemies with 25 maximum HP.

Enemy Type Bonuses.name: Elite Slayer
Enemy Type Bonuses.effect: Choose Accuracy, Damage, or Condition when purchasing. Bonus applies against enemies with 50 maximum HP.

Enemy Type Bonuses.name: Boss Slayer
Enemy Type Bonuses.effect: Choose Accuracy, Damage, or Condition when purchasing. Bonus applies against enemies with 100 maximum HP.

Resource-Based Bonuses.name: Lucky Strike
Resource-Based Bonuses.effect: Using an Effort on this attack allows you to roll an extra die on the Effort roll.

Resource-Based Bonuses.name: Compressed Release
Resource-Based Bonuses.effect: If you have an active Aura ability, you can disable it until the start of your next turn to add +Tier to your Accuracy, Damage, and Condition rolls.

Environmental Bonuses.name: Domain
Environmental Bonuses.effect: If you have an active Barrier ability, gain +Tier to a chosen roll when attacking targets within your Barrier. Select Accuracy, Damage, or Conditions when purchasing.

Environmental Bonuses.name: Tower Defense
Environmental Bonuses.effect: If you have an active Wall ability, gain +Tier to a chosen roll when attacking targets on the opposite side of your Wall. Select Accuracy, Damage, or Conditions when purchasing.

Sustained Attack Systems.name: Channeled
Sustained Attack Systems.effect: For Ranged or AOE attacks. Spend your Primary Action + Movement on subsequent turns to repeat the attack. Gain +Tier to a chosen roll for each consecutive turn channeling (maximum 5 turns). Select Accuracy, Damage, or Conditions when purchasing.
Sustained Attack Systems.scaling: +Tier to chosen roll for each consecutive turn channeling (maximum 5 turns)

Sustained Attack Systems.name: Focused
Sustained Attack Systems.effect: For Melee attacks. Spend your Primary Action + Movement on subsequent turns to repeat the attack. Gain +Tier to a chosen roll for each consecutive turn focusing (maximum 5 turns). Select Accuracy, Damage, or Conditions when purchasing.
Sustained Attack Systems.scaling: +Tier to chosen roll for each consecutive turn focusing (maximum 5 turns)
